Title: Built to Fall
Description:
The Baruk use the forbidden arts of necromancy to trap souls of fallen mogu into the statues that fight for them. 

These tactics are a disgrace to our people, and cannot be allowed to continue.

Break their precious statues, and give them no vessels with which to contaminate with their stolen spirits.
ObjectivesText: Destroy 6 Mogu Statues in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
